title: Say no to Riot Games
body:
They sill do nothing to fix the matchmaking after 10 years of the game been around, they still think a matchmaking system that works of wins and loses is work. Its not Riot Games.

DO NOT GIVE THEM ANY MONEY! 

They want to make more games and they can even fix LoL

all Riot Games cares about is making money not about game quality not about fairness just money
